game.name: Boreal Tenebrae Act 0: Sundowning
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A surreal narrative adventure set on the night Tamarack Narrows collapses into static, fire, and aurora. Follow Sarah, Bree, and the townsfolk as an unknown visitor arrives promising salvation. A lo-fi, analog-horror
game.shortDescriptionEn: A surreal narrative adventure set on the night Tamarack Narrows collapses into static, fire, and aurora. Follow Sarah, Bree, and the townsfolk as an unknown visitor arrives promising salvation. A lo-fi, analog-horror
